mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(B.STANDARD_ID)) FROM PD_TSP_STD B LEFT JOIN PD_STANDARD A ON A.STANDARD_ID = B.STANDARD_ID

SELECT A.TSP_STD_ITEM_ID ,C.TSP_STD_ITEM_NAME ,A.TSP_OK_VAL ,A.TSP_NG_VAL ,C.PARENT_ID ,C.PARENT_NAME FROM PD_TSP_STD AS A LEFT JOIN PD_TSP_STD_ITEM C ON A.TSP_STD_ITEM_ID = C.TSP_STD_ITEM_ID LEFT JOIN PD_STANDARD B ON A.STANDARD_ID = B.STANDARD_ID WHERE A.STANDARD_ID = #{filterMap.standardId} ORDER BY A.STANDARD_ID,A.TSP_STD_ITEM_ID
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(B.STANDARD_ID)) FROM PD_TSP_STD B LEFT JOIN PD_STANDARD A ON A.STANDARD_ID = B.STANDARD_ID

SELECT DISTINCT(B.STANDARD_ID) AS standardId ,A.CLASSES_CODE AS classesCode ,A.BREED_CODE AS breedCode ,A.MACHINING_CODE AS machiningCode ,A.FEATURE_CODE AS featureCode FROM PD_TSP_STD B LEFT JOIN PD_STANDARD A ON A.STANDARD_ID = B.STANDARD_ID ORDER BY B.STANDARD_ID
LIMIT #{startPos}, #{pageCount}
